review.title: “Challenging and rewarding”
review.pros: Pros – Small organization makes it easier to get noticed and climb up the ladder. Variety of clients will give different domain knowledge.
review.cons: Cons – Unsystematic work allocation and poor tracking. Limited growth opportunity as their client base is very small. Domain knowledge irrelevant in the industry.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Should be more systematic and organized. Should give enough opportunity for growth to all. Need to improve people management skills.
